title: Witch's Kurse
description: Jack Kursed has changed. Still ageless and unable to die, he’s found something worth living for. A wonderful daughter, beautiful girlfriend, and some magic to help take the stress off his curse. Hatred for the mortals no longer clouds his thoughts. He’s traded in his dark ways to help his daughter with her homework, sit on the couch with his girlfriend. But good things never last forever, and tragedy finds Jack once again. He will have to do things he never dreamed of to protect those he cares about. Jack will have to ask for help.
author: Glenn Bullion
